title: goimports formats import packages different that go fmt
body:
What does 'go version' print?
go version go1.3.3 linux/amd64
go appengine runtime 1.9.13

What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

1. I've installed goimports using go get
2. Used it to format a project
3. The file import section was modified


What happened?

Imports section looks like this when using goimports
import (
	"encoding/json"
	"encoding/xml"
	"fmt"
	"io/ioutil"
	"net/http"
	"regexp"
	"sync"
	"time"

	"github.com/gorilla/mux"

	"appengine"
	"appengine/urlfetch"
)



What should have happened instead?

Imports section looks like this when using go fmt:
import (
	"appengine"
	"appengine/urlfetch"
	"encoding/json"
	"encoding/xml"
	"fmt"
	"github.com/gorilla/mux"
	"io/ioutil"
	"net/http"
	"regexp"
	"sync"
	"time"
)
